verses.verse: There was also a lot<WH1486> for the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519>; for he was the firstborn<WH1060> of Joseph<WH3130>; to know<WH4353>, for Machir the firstborn<WH1060> of Manasseh<WH4519>, the father<WH1> of Gilead<WH1568>: because he was a man<WH376> of war<WH4421>, therefore he had Gilead<WH1568> and Bashan<WH1316>.

There was also a lot for the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> by their families<WH4940>; for the sons<WH1121> of Abiezer<WH44>, and for the sons<WH1121> of Helek<WH2507>, and for the sons<WH1121> of Asriel<WH844>, and for the sons<WH1121> of Shechem<WH7928>, and for the sons<WH1121> of Hepher<WH2660>, and for the sons<WH1121> of Shemida<WH8061>: these were the male<WH2145> sons<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> by their families<WH4940>.

But Zelophehad<WH6765>, the son<WH1121> of Hepher<WH2660>, the son<WH1121> of Gilead<WH1568>, the son<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353>, the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519>, had no sons<WH1121>, but daughters<WH1323>: and these are the names<WH8034> of his daughters<WH1323>, Mahlah<WH4244>, and Noah<WH5270>, Hoglah<WH2295>, Milcah<WH4435>, and Tirzah<WH8656>.

And they came near<WH7126> before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and before<WH6440> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, and before<WH6440> the princes<WH5387>, saying<WH559>, The Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> us an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> our brothers<WH251>. Therefore according to the commandment<WH6310> of the Lord<WH3068> he gave<WH5414> them an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> the brothers<WH251> of their father<WH1>.
And there fell<WH5307> ten<WH6235> portions<WH2256> to Manasseh<WH4519>, beside the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> and Bashan<WH1316>, which were on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383>;

Because the daughters<WH1323> of Manasseh<WH4519> had<WH5157> an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> his sons<WH1121>: and the rest<WH3498> of Manasseh<WH4519>'s sons<WH1121> had the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568>.

And the coast<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> was from Asher<WH836> to Michmethah<WH4366>, that lies before<WH6440> Shechem<WH7927>; and the border<WH1366> went along<WH1980> on the right hand<WH3225> unto the inhabitants<WH3427> of En<WH5887>–tappuah.
Now Manasseh<WH4519> had the land<WH776> of Tappuah<WH8599>: but Tappuah<WH8599> on the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> belonged to the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669>;

And the coast<WH1366> descended<WH3381> unto the river<WH5158> Kanah<WH7071>, southward<WH5045> of the river<WH5158>: these cities<WH5892> of Ephraim<WH669> are among<WH8432> the cities<WH5892> of Manasseh<WH4519>: the coast<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> also was on the north side<WH6828> of the river<WH5158>, and the outgoings<WH8444> of it were at the sea<WH3220>:

Southward<WH5045> it was Ephraim<WH669>'s, and northward<WH6828> it was Manasseh<WH4519>'s, and the sea<WH3220> is his border<WH1366>; and they met together<WH6293> in Asher<WH836> on the north<WH6828>, and in Issachar<WH3485> on the east<WH4217>.

And Manasseh<WH4519> had in Issachar<WH3485> and in Asher<WH836> Beth<WH1052>–shean and her towns<WH1323>, and Ibleam<WH2991> and her towns<WH1323>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Dor<WH1756> and her towns<WH1323>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Endor<WH5874> and her towns<WH1323>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Taanach<WH8590> and her towns<WH1323>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Megiddo<WH4023> and her towns<WH1323>, even three<WH7969> countries<WH5316>.
Yet the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> could<WH3201> not drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants of those cities<WH5892>; but the Canaanites<WH3669> would<WH2974> live<WH3427> in that land<WH776>.

Yet it came to pass<WH1121>, when the sons of Israel<WH3478> were grown strong<WH2388>, that they put<WH5414> the Canaanites<WH3669> to tribute<WH4522>; but did not utterly<WH3423> drive them out<WH3423>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> spoke<WH1696> unto Joshua<WH3091>, saying<WH559>, Why have you given<WH5414> me but one<WH259> lot<WH1486> and one<WH259> portion<WH2256> to inherit<WH5159>, seeing I am a great<WH7227> people<WH5971>, forasmuch as<WH5704> the Lord<WH3068> has blessed<WH1288> me until now<WH3541>?

And Joshua<WH3091> answered<WH559> them<WH7227>, If you be a great people<WH5971>, then get you up<WH5927> to the wood<WH3293> country<WH1254>, and cut down for yourself there in the land<WH776> of the Perizzites<WH6522> and of the giants<WH7497>, if mountain<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669> be too narrow for you<WH213>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559>, The hill<WH2022> is not enough<WH4672> for us<WH3669>: and all the Canaanites that live<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the valley<WH6010> have chariots<WH7393> of iron<WH1270>, both they who are of Beth<WH1052>–shean and her towns<WH1323>, and they who are of the valley<WH6010> of Jezreel<WH3157>.

And Joshua<WH3091> spoke<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130>, even to Ephraim<WH669> and to Manasseh<WH4519>, saying<WH559>, You are a great<WH7227> people<WH5971>, and have great<WH1419> power<WH3581>: you shall not have one<WH259> lot only<WH1486>:

But the mountain<WH2022> shall be yours<WH3293>; for it is a wood, and you shall cut it down<WH1254>: and the extent<WH8444> of it shall be yours<WH3423>: for you shall drive out the Canaanites<WH3669>, though they have iron<WH1270> chariots<WH7393>, and though they be strong<WH2389>.
